content.rendered:
We’re hiring :

Frontend Web Programmer

Job Requirements :

  • Max. 30 years old
  • Good in Web Programming
  • Good in Javascript (ReactJS/Vue JS)
  • Good Knowledge on developing frontend and familiar with Restfull Services/API.
  • Good knowledge on Git/Version Control
  • Excellent in Communication and Teamwork.
  • Freshgraduete are welcome to apply

Job Responsibility :

  • Design & develop user-interface web application.
  • Integrate back-end components into application
  • Testing & Bug Fixes
  • Collaborating with other teams member to implement design into code

Send your cv & portfolio before 15th March 2023
to career@sevenmediatech.co.id
with subject : Frontend_YourName

excerpt.rendered: We’re hiring : Frontend Web Programmer Job Requirements : Job Responsibility : Send your cv & portfolio before 15th March 2023to career@sevenmediatech.co.idwith subject : Frontend_YourName
